title: "I need your help now, can't you just pause this game?"
body:
Most of my family don't play video games much, let alone online multiplayer games. And often they need my help with stuff on their own devices. but sometimes they don't ask for my help until I start a game of League of Legends. One time I was pulled from a game because they needed my help to copy and paste a link on their phones. 

Part of me is happy to help. Another part of me went: 
https://media.giphy.com/media/m11WXGfYcgtFu/giphy.gif

replies.body: "Okay but tell me why exactly the trash can't wait another 30 minutes?"
Because then the garbage fairy comes and steals you and cooks you. That's what my parents told me.
hahahah!
"Because you've been screaming 'trash mid' and 'trash top' and 'trash' this and that for the past half hour. It's clearly bothering you, so take it out!"
I'm a simple man. I see a comment relevant to my daily life and I upvote.

Because taking out the garbage is a crisis of global proportions. 

If the trash is not taken out in the next 2 minutes, the whole internet will crash, giant meteor the size of Mexico will smash into us, zombies will appear from Call of Duty, all the nuclear warheads will launch on Skynet's command, Hillary wins the 2016 election and immediately declares herself ruler of the world, earth becomes a battleground between heaven and hell, and Super Mario would find the princess in the first castle.
No wonder my internet always gets shut off when I don't do it. Here I thought it was just my disgruntled mom :P
better Hillary than Trump

> [{quoted}](name=Revan Senpai,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=lcLxnxYq,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-09-23T01:47:35.638+0000)
>
> "Okay but tell me why exactly the trash can't wait another 30 minutes?"

Cause people like to bitch for no reason at all
mothers.
My girlfriend used to do this to me. Til I made her play a game of League. Now she knows better lol. (she hates video games you can imagine how a full game of League went)
my girlfriend hates league to the point of not talking to me for at least 2 hours every time she catches me playing, this includes looking me up on lolking.
Wow, that's pretty extreme.

for some context we're long distance and when we were first dating about 4 years ago we only talked through video games, I stopped playing the game we were playing together to play league with my friend (he was a guy but was telling everyone he was a girl, so she prolly was a little jelly) so not 4 years later she hates league and refuses to let me play it for literally no reason besides she hates it.


NO PROBLEM AT ALL WITH OTHER MOBAS OR DOING OTHER SIMILAR THINGS


just the one I want to do. FeelsBadMan
That's pretty controlling.
pretty kinky too if ya know what I mean

Hmmm no its not, its just controlling and she shouldnt decide what games you can and cant play, you should talk to her about it, doesnt seem like a healthy relationship if playing a specifik video game is such a big deal.

yeah, relationships should not be about controlling others. that's why i play the sims. so i can burn people alive in my spare time. tell them they cant use the bathroom even though they're begging to go trying to hold it in in front of their friends and family then im just like "serves you right for cheating on your mom with your cousin you sk**k. NOW MAKE ME A BABY BEFORE YOU DIE"
I remember when i played the sims 2 on the playstation 2 with my friend years ago, we would build a giant maze, call the cops and run around and there for as long as possible, it was great fun :P

> [{quoted}](name=crippler38,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=lcLxnxYq,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-23T03:05:56.432+0000)
>
> for some context we're long distance and when we were first dating about 4 years ago we only talked through video games, I stopped playing the game we were playing together to play league with my friend (he was a guy but was telling everyone he was a girl, so she prolly was a little jelly) so not 4 years later she hates league and refuses to let me play it for literally no reason besides she hates it.
> 
> 
> NO PROBLEM AT ALL WITH OTHER MOBAS OR DOING OTHER SIMILAR THINGS
> 
> 
> just the one I want to do. FeelsBadMan

Your girlfriend shouldn't dictate what games you should play D: I don't do it to my boyfriend our relationship is really healthy
dude that is an abusive relationship.  you should get out.  I am not even joking, she should support your hobbies and what makes you happy as long as you aren't obsessed with it.

> [{quoted}](name=crippler38,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=lcLxnxYq,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-09-23T02:35:12.341+0000)
>
> my girlfriend hates league to the point of not talking to me for at least 2 hours every time she catches me playing, this includes looking me up on lolking.

You are living the dream. Never stop playing.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Tell them to wait. It's not difficult. I don't think your whole family is right at your service when you ask them to do some trivial thing.

Wait till you queue up, get in champ select and realize you gotta shit. Pick that champ, run into the bathroom and sit down only to find there's no tp. Then when youre calling for some they say "well just wait 45 minutes like you made me wait earlier".
I've never understood the practice of not stashing all the toilet paper in the same room as the toilet. It makes absolutely no sense but this is what my mother did.

I have 2 bathrooms. Sometimes 1 runs out and I have to ask my gf to get some from the other bathroom. 

Also why'd I get so down voted XD
its generally so if the toilet breaks you dont ruin the tissue everything else can wash what i dont get is not being able to walk around you house with you pants around your ankles
No tp is an emergency! No one make someone else wait for tp. But copy-paste a link can or trash can wait

While you make an excellent point, they will fight about it. Your hobbies are simply not making money for them to stfu. I know our society defends parents and that they know better than their kids but in reality most of them only had us so we can spend most of our lives serving them. Thank god for nursing homes, I in no way in hell would take care of my mother's grumpy ass for the next 30 so years till she kicks the bucket. Cursed out my fiance because she doesn't come from a more privileged family. wtf kinda shit is that.
http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/eb/ebb15b05c8fbca2b2b30d416a6905a1ae368064e2aca65ffbbfe483801b63b70.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=9kPluzZ,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=lcLxnxYq,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2016-09-23T20:51:25.655+0000)
>
> http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/eb/ebb15b05c8fbca2b2b30d416a6905a1ae368064e2aca65ffbbfe483801b63b70.jpg

Warcraft III had pause in multiplayer which was nice. The pauses were limited per player though.
this is me literally every time I play league (and Dark Souls)
Except Dark Souls allows you to finish a fight and leave, rather than locking you in until you've completed the game.
INB4 next darksouls game can't be turned off or character gets deleted.

Hardcore Dark Souls:

You die once, game over forever. Your console can never play the game again and you cannot delete the data marking it as such.
Souls required for each level halved and cap doubled.

/pause
:^)

( only works in customs though as far as I know ;x )
Can you get penalized for going afk during a pause?
No, you can't get any penalty for being afk in custom in the first place.
not sure about that. pretty sure I got afk warnings in customs before
You get the warning even if you're the only player in the room. Who the fuck will report you?
The minions for AFKing and not trying to help them win.

Yes, and it will kick you from the game, if you afk for too long, but leaverbuster won't penalize you, even if there are other people in the game.

And yes, I'm sure, I've played hundreds of custom games, when you could still use dominion map, and I often afked, in certain custom gamemode, when I was out.
Only works in Tournament Draft customs. :)
call them when they on the high way and tell them they got 3 mins to have the macaroni done

Common saying in my house hold is "The next time you die I need your help." For the people who use the excuse that they have to go for supper (I know I have) I take proactive steps in knowing when supper will be ready and not to start a game of league. Take some responsibility, I know its just a game but games aren't fun when your team leaves because they have to take the garbage out.

Yeah... people don't understand that if you leave the game, it's not just your time you're losing out on, 9 other people somewhere in the world are having their time wasted because something that definitely can wait half an hour to an hour is being requested to be done asap... 

-_-
Just take your time one day, and explain it to your family, most people will understand if you simply talk about it. Worked pretty fine for me.

Just last night, my baby sister was driving to the airport to pick up my other sister... aaand of course had to get lost and call me for directions while I'm in the middle of an intense game.

I love you, Cheesecake, but you need to get yourself a smartphone.
hahahahahah #truth

I was once in a ranked game with a friend, and my sister called me on the phone that she was stranded on the highway with a flat. I told my dad so I can keep playing but he wanted me to go help him. My words to him were "My team needs me, I can't leave them hanging." We lost that game. I probably should have went with him.
